mapper.insert:
insert all
into sys_user (id,icon,name,real_name,sex,birth_date,reg_time,mobile_phone,email,wechat_openid,org_code,org_privilege,role_list,locked,state,id_type,id_number,expired_time,password_expired_time,password,password_error_times) values(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.wechatOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.orgPrivilege,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.roleList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.locked,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{item.state,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{item.idType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.expiredTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.passwordExpiredTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.passwordErrorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user where id in #{item}
delete from sys_user where name in #{item}
delete from sys_user where mobile_phone in #{item}
delete from sys_user where email in #{item}
delete from sys_user where wechat_openid in #{item}
delete from sys_user where org_code in (${_parameter})
delete from sys_user where id_type = #{idType} AND id_number = #{idNumber}

delete from sys_user where id in
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sys_user set icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_openid = #{wechatOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_privilege = #{orgPrivilege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_list = #{roleList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expired_time = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=DATE}, password_expired_time = #{passwordExpiredTime,jdbcType=DATE}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_error_times = #{passwordErrorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{record.realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{record.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, reg_time = #{record.regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mobile_phone = #{record.mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_openid = #{record.wechatOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_code = #{record.orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_privilege = #{record.orgPrivilege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_list = #{record.roleList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{record.locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, id_type = #{record.idType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_number = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expired_time = #{record.expiredTime,jdbcType=DATE}, password_expired_time = #{record.passwordExpiredTime,jdbcType=DATE}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_error_times = #{record.passwordErrorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
